channel.title: CVE Feed for MiniOrange -- OAuth Single Sign On Free
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MiniOrange -- OAuth Single Sign On Free

item.title: CVE-2023-1092|2023-03-27T15:39:36.079Z -- miniorange -- oauth%20single%20sign%20on%20free
item.description: The OAuth Single Sign On Free WordPress plugin before 6.24.2, OAuth Single Sign On Standard WordPress plugin before 28.4.9, OAuth Single Sign On Premium WordPress plugin before 38.4.9 and OAuth Single Sign On Enterprise WordPress plugin before 48.4.9 do not have CSRF checks when deleting Identity Providers (IdP), which could allow attackers to make logged in admins delete arbitrary IdP via a CSRF attack
